data.text:
#TravelTuesday ✈️ 🚗 🏨 

I still have some travel to book for 2023 ….

Anyone know if @Delta, @MarriottBonvoy @HiltonHotels have promos worth exploring today ???

Is it worth re-booking my rental cars already booked??!! 

Thoughts ❓

data.text: Anyone know how long it usually takes for a @VirginAtlantic itinerary to credit to @Delta? I flew with VS a few weeks ago but still haven't received mileage credit.

urls.title: Report: Delta To Cut Lounge Access For Elites Flying International Coach, Premium Economy - View from the Wing
urls.description: Delta is reportedly on the verge of an announcement to cut Sky Club access for elite frequent flyers traveling in long haul economy and premium economy cabins. These new restrictions, if implemented, would become part of a strategy to address extreme crowding in the airline's lounges that have lead to long lines and to turning away club members in some locations.

data.text:
This would be a MAJOR moment if it has the impact @Delta execs seem to think it might. My take in the threaded tweet(s).

https://t.co/gIoCHB3kds

(Reporting from @GaryLeff via @BrianSumers)

data.text: @BoardingArea @OneMileataTime The Sky Club is no longer enjoyable and I won’t stand in line to get in. I pay for my membership. Time to cut out the freebies and give priority to those who pay cash. @Delta
